response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. Our proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's true worth and your anticipated use. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
